package.name: Evolutis_QuickSearch
package.summary: Improves the Quick Search functionality with weight on each attribute and OR/AND operator for the search query.
package.description: This extension improves the Quick Search functionality of Magento. It adds a “Search weight” property on product attributes, with possible values being “Low”, “Normal” (the default) and “High”. For example, you may want to make the “Name” attribute more important than the others (such as “Description”). This can improve the relevance of the first search results, and allow customers to find your products quicker, without having to browse several pages of results. The extension also allows you to switch between an OR operator and an AND operator for queries with multiple words.
package.notes: Improves the Quick Search functionality with weight on each attribute and OR/AND operator for the search query.
